thread.title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to June 28

author: Reuters Editorial
title: DIARY-Emerging Markets Economic Events to June 28

organizations.name: estonian central bank bovernor ardo hansson
general news u.s. federal reserve today

text:
April 17 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top Economic Events
Emerging Markets Economic Events
Government Debt Auctions
Political and General News
U.S. Federal Reserve
Today in Washington - This Diary is filed daily. ** Indicates new events -
TUESDAY, APRIL 17 ** TALLINN - Estonian central bank to release its financial stability report, European Central Bank policymaker and Estonian Central Bank Bovernor Ardo Hansson will speak – 0900 GMT. SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0130 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 18 ** BUDAPEST - National Bank of Hungary Deputy Governor Marton Nagy will speak at Business conference on bank lending – 0700 GMT.
JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds Board of Governors Meeting. (to April 19).
MONDAY, APRIL 23 BEIJING - China’s banking and insurance regulator will hold a press conference to talk about illegal fundraising activity in China and new regulations in the works - 0630 GMT.
SYDNEY - Speech by Christopher Kent, RBA Assistant Governor (Financial Markets), at the Housing Industry Association Breakfast, Sydney – 2200 GMT.
TUESDAY, APRIL 24 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank board member Vojtech Benda will comment on the bank’s monetary policy.
BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, APRIL 25 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (no interest rate announcement). ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey holds monetary policy meeting.
THURSDAY, APRIL 26 SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meets to announce interest rates.
CHISINAU - National Bank of Moldova announces interest rate decision. MEXICO CITY - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting.
FRIDAY, APRIL 27 ** SOFIA - The EU Economic and Financial Affairs Council gathers for an informal meeting in Bulgaria (to Apr 28).
MOSCOW - Central Bank of Russia announces interest rate decision - 1030 GMT. WARSAW - National Bank of Poland release the minutes of its monitory policy meeting.
MONDAY, APRIL 30 ANKARA - Central Bank of Turkey releases minutes of its April monetary policy committee meeting.
TUESDAY, MAY 1 ** ADELAIDE, Australia - Remarks by Philip Lowe, RBA Governor, at the Reserve Bank Board Dinner. SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia holds interest rate meeting - 0430 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MAY 2 TIRANA – Bank of Albania press conference – interest rate -1400 GMT.
TBILISI - National Bank of Georgia holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting. SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile holds monetary policy meeting (to May 3).
THURSDAY, MAY 3 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank holds Monetary Policy Meeting. Statement and presentation will be published. FRIDAY, MAY 4 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia issues statement on Monetary Policy – 0130 GMT.
TUESDAY, MAY 8 BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. SYDNEY - Speech by Matthew Boge, RBA Deputy Head, International Department – 0330 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MAY 9 ZAGREB - Croatia National Bank holds monetary policy meeting. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank to publish the minutes of its April 2018 rate-setting meeting – 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, MAY 10 LIMA - Central Bank of Peru announces interest rate decision. KUALA LUMPUR - Central Bank of Malaysia announces interest rate decision. MANILA - Philippines Central Bank holds Monetary Policy Meeting. BELGRADE - National Bank of Serbia interest rate decision.
FRIDAY, MAY 11 PRAGUE - Czech National Bank will release the minutes of its May 2018 Monetary Policy Meeting.
TUESDAY, MAY 15 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (to May 16).
BRASILIA- Central Bank of Brazil holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting (to May 16). SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) will release the minutes of March monetary policy meeting – 0130 GMT.
WEDNESDAY, MAY 16 JAKARTA – Indonesia Central Bank holds Board of Governors Meeting. (to May 17). BANGKOK - Bank of Thailand monetary policy committee meeting.
THURSDAY, MAY 17 MEXICO CITY - Central Bank of Mexico publishes monetary policy statement. CAIRO - Central Bank of Egypt holds monetary policy committee meeting. WEDNESDAY, May 18 SYDNEY - Reserve Bank of Australia Payments System Board Meeting.
MONDAY, MAY 21 ABUJA - Central Bank of Nigeria holds monetary policy meeting (to May 22).
TUESDAY, MAY 22 BUCHAREST - OMFIF Economists Meeting with the National Bank of Romania.
CAPE TOWN - South Africa Reserve Bank starts its three day monetary policy committee meeting (to May 24). BUENOS AIRES - Central Bank of Argentina releases monetary policy statement. BUDAPEST - Hungarian Central Bank holds its rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, MAY 24 SEOUL - Bank of Korea holds a monetary policy meeting to announce interest rates.
KIEV - National Bank of Ukraine holds monetary policy meeting. KIEV - The Governor of the National Bank of Ukraine Yakiv Smoliy holds a press conference – 1100 GMT.
MONDAY, MAY 28 JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces interest rate decision. TUESDAY, MAY 29 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council Meeting (No interest rate announcement).
THURSDAY, MAY 31 SUVA - Reserve Bank of Fiji holds board meeting to announce interest rates. MEXICO CITY - Mexico Central Bank issues the minutes of its monetary policy meeting.
WEDNESDAY, JUNE 6 MUMBAI - Reserve Bank of India holds Monetary Policy Committee Meeting. TUESDAY, JUNE 12
SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile holds monetary policy meeting (to June 13). WEDNESDAY, JUNE 13
WINDHOEK - Central Bank of Namibia holds Monetary Policy Meeting. TUESDAY, JUNE 19
RABAT - Bank of Morocco holds monetary policy meeting. THURSDAY, JUNE 21
MANILA - Philippines Central Bank holds Monetary Policy Meeting. WEDNESDAY, JUNE 27
JAKARTA - Indonesia Central Bank holds Board of Governors Meeting. (to June 28).
